website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use model that allows for wireless connectivity and great sound in multiple rooms
pros: Amazing audio from a soundbar that doesn't take long to set up
Doesn't require extra equipment to operate
Control the sound system through a smartphone app
Bluetooth compatible, meaning you can easily connect your smartphone or other mobile devices to use the soundbar
cons: Some models suffer from intermittent audio disruptions

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and good price -  but has limitations....
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar - awesome sound for the price. I researched all the common names, Bose, Sonos, etc and preferred the open architecture of play-fi + Klipsch was too hard to pass up. ***Update 4/14/18****** The soundbar will not pass a chroma of greater than 4:2:0 (4K UHD @60hz), so if you have a video requirement that is higher than that the sound and picture will stutter and dropout - I am looking for a workaround (e.g., an hdmi splitter that can send different video signals to different outputs). Klipsh has no information regarding updating the soundbar - Dropping to 3 stars from 5 for this - if they do the upgrade I will change it back to 5.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I followed the directions that looked like a grade school kid put together
customer_reviews.text: I ignored other reviews that discussed my same problems. Big mistake. Hassle, one big hassle. First ,the HDMI arc cable from the TV did not produce sound. This was a brand new top of the line TV. I contact Klipsch and put in a help ticket. Never heard from them. By the way, I followed the directions that looked like a grade school kid put together. Pathetic. So I bought an optical cable and great news- sound! Well not so great. The subwoofer did not pair with the sound bar. Or did not power up. I could not tell. By the way the directions for pairing showed pictures of a different subwoofer!
customer_reviews.author: MATT KRAMER

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to set up and operate
customer_reviews.text: After having to unplug the unit every time the TV was turned on to get it to work, it finally has failed completely. Just spent 2 hours going through every TV and unit iteration and it still doesn't work. First time and last time buyer of Klipsch
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Emerson III

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar have technical issues
customer_reviews.text: Klipsh is know for their quality sound and products, and for this specific product I gotta said that I only got quality sound. Overall this sound bar is amazing if it turn on, and that's the only problem I have, it goes on zombie mode and I have to plug it and unplug it couple times to reset it and make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Unit sounded good when it worked, but it constantly dropped the wifi connection after 5-10 minutes, despite a strong wifi signal in the room. You can always hook up bluetooth, but sound quality is not good at all. I would not recommend at all. I purchased the LGSK9Y, and it has worked flawlessly and the sound quality is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Todahl

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different model klipsche have some great sound if you have the big subwoofer with it. Can't go wrong with you
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: USELESS INSTRUCTIONS, Difficult (impossible for me) set up - avoid unless this doesn't scare you
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I am an electrical engineer and tech savy and I never could get the REQUIRED app to load on my phone and sync with the unit. The owner's manual / instruction manual was LESS THAN USELESS. The instructions were comprised of one step - download the app and follow directions in the app - that's it!! That's all it said. Without the app working properly I had a $600 pile of useless electronics so I sent it back for a refund. Apparently some folks are able to set it up and make it work, and supposedly it sounds great, but I was not able to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D. Preston

customer_reviews.title: ... is more interested in the wifi for other uses like Pandora etc
customer_reviews.text: Thought I bought a sound bar for my TV but Klipsch is more interested in the wifi for other uses like Pandora etc. Can't get it to work with HDMI. Sending it back so someone else can be frustrated. The instruction manual is very incomplete. Buy and other brand is my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Wall to Wall Sound
customer_reviews.text: The Klipsch Reference RSB-8 sound bar with wireless subwoofer gives your living room a home theater sound! Huge! Easy to set up and use, I had no problem with the Bluetooth connectivity. The sound bar I put directly beneath my TV and then moved the sub woofer around until I found exactly the right spot for the very best sound. With the Bluetooth, mobility is simple and quick. You can move the sub woofer around the room or even into another room. Fantastic sound!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kear

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sound
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and gives you the most awesome surround sound. Easy to connect to most anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Jones

product_meta.title: Klipsch Reference RSB-8 Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer
product_meta.description: The Klipsch Reference rsb-8 sound bar and wireless subwoofer seamlessly transform your lifeless room into a live concert venue. As Part of the Klipsch stream multi-room wireless solution, this sound bar can easily be controlled from your phone and syncs with any other Klipsch stream products for a whole-home audio Eco-System.
feature_bullets: Klipsch Tractrix Horns For Impactful Sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars23 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
